mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chatRoom (num, userId, roomId, roomName, userCount, maxUserCnt, roomPwd, secretChk, chatType) VALUES (#{num}, #{userId}, #{roomId}, #{roomName}, 0, #{maxUserCnt}, #{roomPwd}, #{secretChk}, #{chatType})
mapper.update: UPDATE chatRoom SET userCount = CASE WHEN userCount > 0 THEN userCount - 1 ELSE 0 END WHERE roomId = #{roomId}
mapper.select: SELECT CASE WHEN userCount + 1 > maxUserCnt THEN 0 ELSE 1 END FROM chatRoom WHERE roomId = #{roomId}
